*02635*  Production statistics collection or analysis services                         Carrier-range
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement

### Title

* Commercial Seaweed Production

* Production des algues commerciales

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-234-95533110
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004555
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-22T14:00:00 (Closed)
* **Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-08
* **Contract End Date**: 2024-09-30

### Procurement Details

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking a vendor to conduct a systematic review of available literature and data sources to support the estimation of seaweed wild commercial harvest and aquaculture production. The vendor will be required to interview harvesters, aquaculture companies, and other stakeholders to identify spatial and other attributes of the activities and allocate the product to various uses. A report will be provided including the results and a description of the methodology, sufficient for others to replicate and update the results.

The contract will be awarded on the basis of the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Supplier Eligibility

This tender is open only to Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 for Statistical Analyst (one [1] senior-level resource).

Suppliers who are not SA-holders must contact PSPC's SA Authority for the TSPS SA to be added for future opportunities.

### Tender Description

The tender requires the vendor to develop a methodology for regular updates of production quantity and value, spatial location of harvest and production areas, and provide a report on the results and methodology. The initial list of invited bidders includes several companies.

### Contact Information

* Contact: Charles Nwachukwu
* Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone: (902) 478-9713
* Address: 200 Kent St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6

### Trade Agreements

Canada is a signatory to several trade agreements, including CPTPP, CETA, CFTA, and others.

### Regions of Opportunity

* Canada

### Regions of Delivery

* Canada
